verses.name: Genesis 25:6
verses.text: But unto the sons of the concubines, which Abraham had, Abraham gave gifts, and sent them away from Isaac his son, while he yet lived, eastward, unto the east country.

verses.name: Genesis 25:7
verses.text: And these are the days of the years of Abraham’s life which he lived, an hundred threescore and fifteen years.

verses.name: Genesis 25:8
verses.text: Then Abraham gave up the ghost, and died in a good old age, an old man, and full of years; and was gathered to his people.
